levels.description: ATK <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</>. Immediately fires harpoons at the <@ba.vup>{max_target}</> heaviest enemies within range, <$ba.root><@ba.vup>Binding</></> them and attacking them once every second for the duration of this skill
